system.attributeIncrease: Normal Strength if at least size 2. Beastly Strength if at least size 3.
system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size.

overview.base: You gain Climbing and Leaping.
You climb at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead climb at normal speed.

overview.base: You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base: Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Limited Agile.
You walk through difficult terrain at normal speed.
As you attack, choose either arm or leg. The damage gets dealt accordingly.

results.hit: The target takes 1 hack damage on either an arm or leg, depending on what you chose.
results.critHit: The target takes 2 hack damage on either arms or legs, depending on what you chose.

results.hit: Target takes a body hack.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.
You have another body part (tail, tentacle, etc.) that can be used as an additional hand. When used to make a hand attack, this body part has the wraparound fighting style.

results.hit: Target takes a vitals hack of your choice.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.
